name: The Neverending Party
description:
Install instructions

The game was made with create-react-app. You can run it with the following steps:

  1. Ensure you have NPM installed.
  2. Open up Terminal, and run 'npm install' inside the unzipped folder.
  3. Run 'npm start' and your game should open up in a new browser window. If not, open a new browser tab and go to the url 'localhost:3000' to play the game!
